content: Create comprehensive debugging framework for ML pipeline components (NPU, ML analysis, memory management, thermal protection)
Implement NPU error detection and recovery mechanisms with Intel Meteor Lake specific optimizations
Create military-grade validation testing system with classification level verification
Build performance bottleneck analysis system for cache hierarchy and memory bandwidth
Implement security vulnerability detection in the analysis system itself
Create automated testing suite with continuous integration validation
Build real-time debugging dashboard with military classification displays
Implement error recovery and failover mechanisms with graceful degradation
